comments:
Build:  TPTP-4.2.0-200602262249

Follow the steps *exactly* to be able to reproduce the problem:

Start a *fresh* workspace
Close the welcome page and switch to the resource perspective
Click File > New > Project > General > Project > Type in "Simple Project" > Finish
Click File > New > Other > Generic Log Adapter > Generic Log Adapter File > Select Simple Project > Next > Choose the attached file as the template > Finish
Click Yes when prompted to switch perspective
Expand Adapter > Configuration > Select Context Instance
Run the adapter file in the extractor view
Click Show *Next* Event > Show *Last* Event > Show *First* Event > Show *Next* Event
Switch back to the resource perspective 
Click File > New > Other > Generic Log Adapter > Generic Log Adapter File > Next

In my case the wizard page was not displayed when I clicked Next.  I got the following exception in my workspace log:

java.lang.NullPointerException

This problem should go away in Eclipse 3.2 M6 (fixed already in bug 129156), we will live with this problem for now in this scenario.
